steps.content: The top menu bar provides various functions which operate on the whole dataset:
‘Export dataset data’- Exports the whole dataset into a downloadable file
‘Delete dataset data’- Deletes all the data in the dataset
‘Validate’- Runs validations for the whole dataset NB: This can take some time
‘Show validations’- Shows a table of all the validation issues found across the whole dataset
‘QC rules’ – shows a list of all the validations which have been created for the dataset
‘Dashboards’ - Provides a visualisation of the validation feedback
‘Manage copies’ - Functionality to save copies of the data
‘Refresh’- After import, validation and restore copy, you need to refresh the tables
